    Guide to honey production package

    Plotting Average Price of Every State

    price_plot.Rd

    This function takes a `state' object to plot the average price histogram for the input state, and this value can be easily found from the graph by highlighting the selected state.

    Usage

    price_plot(state_name)

    Arguments

    state_name

    character. Every state of US from HoneyProduction dataset.

    Value

    A bar chart showing the average price of honey in each state, with selected states highlighted and others grayed out, meanwhile each state's price data displayed on its own bar.

    Examples

    price_plot("AL")

    
price_plot(state_name = "AL")
